page.title: 03LOCAL FARMS
page.content: {LOCAL FARMS}part 2 The farmers all provided housing for their workers.Most of the farmers had cows on their farms.Some had North Country Cheviot sheep.The most common crops grown were{wheat,barley and {turnips.}The farmers all used the system known as{crop rotation.} All were grateful for{pesticides} although they thought they could be harmful on occasion. Every farmer enjoyed his life and wouldn't dream of changing their jobs. They all thought that farming has changed tremendously during the last 30 years.With one exception they all thought their farms were modern and up to date.All of them use some acres for{woodland}and{wildlife.
